titleStmt.title: An expositio[n] of the .4. chap. of S. Joans Reuelation made by Bar. Traheron, in sondrie readinges before his countre men in Germanie. Where in the prouide[n]ce of God is treated with an annswer made to the obiection of a gentle aduersarie
Exposition of the .4. chap. of S. Joans Revelation.
titleStmt.author: Traheron, Bartholomew, 1510?-1558?

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
